name: Plagueheart Robe
tooltip:
Plagueheart RobeLevel 60

Mataus the Wrathcaster at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make a Plagueheart Robe if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Robe, 25 Wartorn Cloth Scraps, 4 Mooncloth and 2 Nexus Crystals.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Robe
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 25
- Mooncloth x 4
- Nexus Crystal x 2
